Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22770564]HIV-1:inhibition of cell-cell fusion between CHO-WT cells and K652 cells(IC50=7.2 ± 0.7 nM).

Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide have been shown to be effective inhibitors to prevent virus–host cell membrane fusion.
